frozen.name: python3.7-snakemake
frozen.shortDescription: Python-based execution environment for make-like workflows
frozen.longDescription:
Snakemake is a workflow management system that aims to reduce the complexity of
creating workflows by providing a fast and comfortable execution environment,
together with a clean and readable specification language in Python style. Snakemake
workflows are essentially Python scripts extended by declarative code to define
rules. Rules describe how to create output files from input files.
